label: logicB:sports_en
steps: [1] If the team wins the midfield battle, then it controls possession.
[2] If it controls possession, then it creates scoring chances.
[3] Any player who completed intensive finishing drills is sharp in front of goal.
[4] If the team creates scoring chances and Striker Lee is sharp in front of goal, then the team scores a goal.
[5] The team wins the midfield battle.
[6] Striker Lee completed intensive finishing drills.
[7] The team creates scoring chances and Striker Lee is sharp in front of goal (from [1â€“3], [5], [6]).
[8] The team scores a goal (from [4] and [7]).
